meanings.definition: To take as a husband or wife
meanings.sent1: She is marrying her high school sweetheart next month.
meanings.sent2: They are marrying in a beautiful ceremony by the beach.
meanings.sent3: The idea of marrying a penguin for a day sounds like a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: Their love was like two rivers marrying into one powerful stream.
meanings.sent5: The image of them marrying under the starlit sky will forever be etched in my memory.
